Halima Tayo Alao is a Nigerian architect and former Minister of Environment and Housing during President Umaru Yar'Adua's administration.
A mụrụ Halima Tayo Alao n'ọnwa December n'ọnwa 1956

O nwere nzere Masters n' ihe gbasara isepụta ka esi aru ụlọ di iche iche na mahadum nke dị na Zaria n"afọ 1981.  N'afọ 1982 o sonyere  ndi oru oyibo nke  Kwara State.  ọ mechara bụrụ onye isi nke akpọrọ  Permanent Secretary  n'uụlọ Ministry of Works and Transport, Ilorin, Kwara State
O nwere nzere Masters na  Public Administration n' afọ, 2003  na Mahadum nke ilorin University of Ilorin. Site n'afọ 2005 rue July 2006 s ọ rụrụ dika Minista na-ahu maka ahụ ike.

Halima Tayo Alao rụkwara ọru dika Minista na-ahu maka gburugburu nakwa ụlọ na afo 2007 bu nke onye isi ala  Umaru Yaradua.n afọ 2008 ewepụrụ ya na cabineti.N. Nwepụ a bu maka nghọtaghe di n'etiti ya na minista nke otu patiAPC bu Chuka Oduonye ọzọ nochitere anya ya bu  John Odey, onye nke ahọpụtara na ọnwa  December nafo 2008.
